Text: This is awesome, thanks so much!

This is probably a long shot, but do you have The Second Life of Doctor Mirage?
ineffed, you can find the complete doctor mirage (and all the original valiant books) in this torrent from a few months ago: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7833326/Valiant_and_Acclaim_all_titles_giga

finally, i've been searching for this for months since i red the preview. 
i thought it was never going to be digitalized.

how come the issues scans are released now altogheter??

why not monthly like it uses to happen with most going on series?
you're welcome ineffed. deimos170, perhaps the scanners just hadn't gotten around to it? relatively speaking, that happens with many indy comics titles. quite a few books aren't scanned on 0-days.
Thanks for the upload. I bought the first two issues but I've yet to read them. lol
